PHRASE.LANG: With the Comfort Space Bundle, you can sit back and relax with both the white and black versions of the Tube and Cube Furniture. (Cube Chair, Cube Couch, Tube Chair, Tube Couch and Tube Loveseat.) [#Legal]

Avec le Lot Confort de l'Espace, vous pouvez vous installer confortablement et vous relaxer avec les versions blanches et noires des meubles Tubes et Cubes. (Chaise Cube, Canapé Cube, Chaise Tube, Canapé Tube et Canapé Deux Places Tube.) [#Legal]

With the Comfort Space Bundle, you can sit back and relax with both the white and black versions of the Tube and Cube Furniture. (Cube Chair, Cube Couch, Tube Chair, Tube Couch and Tube Loveseat.) [#Legal]
